courseDetails.title: Unlock The Power of ChatGPT: From Zero to Hero in One Hour.
courseDetails.shortDescription: Transform Your Skills with ChatGPT: Learn to Navigate, Apply & Overcome Common Issues, From Basic to Advance Application
targetAudiences: This course is designed for individuals who are interested in learning more about the capabilities and potential uses of the ChatGPT language model. It is intended for those who have a basic understanding of AI and machine learning and would like to learn more about how ChatGPT can be used to improve their personal and professional projects. The course is suitable for beginners who are looking to improve their writing skills, networking strategies, interview skills and more. The course is also suitable for journalists, bloggers, job seekers and people who want to work on their budget. It is also suitable for anyone who is interested in learning about the ethical considerations and best practices for using ChatGPT.

courseDetails.title: Staying Safe Online
courseDetails.shortDescription: A Beginner's Guide to Cybersecurity
targetAudiences: This online security course is intended for individuals of all ages and backgrounds who want to learn how to protect themselves and their personal information while using the internet. The course is designed to be accessible to learners with varying levels of technical knowledge, and no prior experience in online security is required. The course is suitable for anyone who uses the internet for personal or professional purposes, such as browsing, social media, online banking, or e-commerce. This course is intended to be a resource for anyone who wants to stay safe while navigating the digital world and want to learn best practices for maintaining online security.

courseDetails.title: Read Construction & Structural Drawings Like An Expert
courseDetails.shortDescription: Full Course on Structural Drawings From Basic to Advance
targetAudiences: The proposedTotal Project Area of the Project is 5.75 Acre. Project comprises of two low rise structures and two high rise towers with the one basement levels as detailed below-  • G+32 storey tower =1 No. • G+22 storey tower = 1 No. • G+4 storey Administrative Block = 1 No. • G+1 Convention Block = 1 No. • Basement = 1 level  Total Ground Coverage is 6834 sqm and Total Built-up area of all floors are 88000 Sqm. Building is designed on the basis of Green Building Concept and also to achieve a LEEDS platinum rating. Structure has been designed as a RCC framed structure and type of foundation is Raft Foundation. Parking facility is provided in a basement and at stilt level. Offices of the various department are housed in two high-rise towers. The Administration & Auditorium blocks are located at the front in low-rise structures.
